channel.description: does any1 have these for server sided bit?

@_Rich wrote:

Removed spam.

Also, I told you how to do it, now you must make the command.

If you have problems with it, then you can just show it and we’ll help you the best we can.

item.title: Price checker and Items kept on death

@11167 wrote:

Break apart what he said, and you will be able to do it. `Rich will do a maximum of 20% of it, if you’re lucky (only 20% being an example he works up)

item.title: Price checker and Items kept on death
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:2, topic:289826"]Yes, there both pretty easy to do.

With price checker, just display the item on the interface, and the value. For item’s kept upon death, loop through the player’s inventory/equipment, add the player’s most valued items into an array (how many depending on if they’re skulled, item protection prayer on, etc), display them on the first part of an interface, and display the rest of the items in the lower part of the interface (if you’re using the actual interface).[/quote]
Oh, but can you give me the code to put in my server?
cuz i will get the code wrong and get 100 errors, if i put in there myself.

Read full topic
item.source: Price checker and Items kept on death

item.title: Price checker and Items kept on death
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Yes, there both pretty easy to do.

With price checker, just display the item on the interface, and the value. For item’s kept upon death, loop through the player’s inventory/equipment, add the player’s most valued items into an array (how many depending on if they’re skulled, item protection prayer on, etc), display them on the first part of an interface, and display the rest of the items in the lower part of the interface (if you’re using the actual interface).

Read full topic
